Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky brown below; alternating added red and added white petals; exterior: trace of painted decoration consisting of undetermined motif at bottom of sherd; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1949) (phase 2)
